title: Theinvest.club
author: Theinvest.club
content: TraderZOE - Buy | Borrow | Swap and Earn Cryptocurrency ★ WEBSITE ★ TWITTER ★ TELEGRAM GROUP ★ TG Channel  ★ Bounty Spreadsheets ★★★★★★GENERAL BOUNTY DETAILS★★★★★1. Bounty Campaign is managed by TheinvestClub2. 500,000 $ZOE token will be divided to all participants depending on stakes accumulated3. Bounty Campaign will run for 4 weeks. November 26, 2022 to January 6, 20234. Bounty rewards will be distributed 2 months after the bounty ends5. Bounty rewards will be sent to your BEP20 Wallet address6. Wallet address cannot be change once submitted7. I am not part of the team, For any problems or concern about the project contact them directly via their telegram group★★★★★GENERAL BOUNTY RULES★★★★★1. Must follow their telegram news channel - https://t.me/TraderZoe_online2. Must join their official telegram group - https://t.me/Zoe_Group and Bounty group - https://t.me/ZoeBounty3. KYC is not required to join and receive rewards from TraderZOE bounty campaign4. Newbie account is accepted but with minimum of 30 Activity to be considered5. User with negative trust from DT members will not be accepted★★★★★BOUNTY ALLOCATION★★★★★Twitter: 30% (Max 300 slots) Facebook: 20% (Max 300 slots)Shorts: 15% (Max 100 slots)Reddit: 5% (Max 100 slots) Telegram: 5% (Max 500 slots) Article: 10% (Max 100 slots)Video: 15% (Max 100 slots)★★★★★BOUNTY SCHEDULE★★★★★Week #1 11/26 - 12/02Week #2 12/03 - 12/09Week #3 12/10 - 12/16Week #4 12/17 - 12/23Week #5 12/24 - 12/30Week #6 12/31 - 01/06/2023Proof Of Registration FormatQuote#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BEP20  Wallet Address:★★★★★TWITTER CAMPAIGN RULES★★★★★1. Must follow TraderZoe twitter profile https://twitter.com/TraderZoe_2. Twitter Account must have atleast 300 followers3. Participants must RT + Quote (Max of 1 per day) 5 tweets made by TraderZOE4. Participants must tweet 2 original tweet (Max of 1 per day)5. Use hash tags $ZOE #ZOE #BNB #Airdrop #Presale #ICO #Binance #TraderZOE★★★★★TWITTER CAMPAIGN REWARDS★★★★★300 to 1999 Followers = 10 Stake2000 to 5000 Followers = 20 Stakes5001 and Up Followers = 30 StakesFill up the form: https://forms.gle/45b2zv7TokduukVx9★★★★★REDDIT CAMPAIGN RULES★★★★★1.Reddit account must be atleast 1 month old2. Must create an informative post about TraderZOE (About Airdrop, Products, features, Presale)3. No SPAM or Junk post4. Max of 3 post per participants per week in different crypto related subreddit group5. Minimum of 50 post karma to participate★★★★★REDDIT CAMPAIGN REWARDS★★★★★50 - 100 Post Karma = 10 Stake101 - 399 Post Karma = 20 Stake400 and Up Post karma = 30 StakeFill up the form: https://forms.gle/XS1T7FA7p3gaq6J69★★★★★TELEGRAM CAMPAIGN RULES★★★★★1. Participants must share TraderZOE in 5 different crypto related telegram groups without getting banned or post getting deleted.2. Must create an informative post about TraderZOE3. No SPAM or Junk post or Generic post will not be counted4. Must include Telegram group link on your post.5. Max of 5 post per week★★★★★TELEGRAM CAMPAIGN REWARDS★★★★★100 Stake per valid postFill up the form: https://forms.gle/Rpsai44L6NvtZ3uU6★★★★★ARTICLE CAMPAIGN RULES★★★★★1. Content must be original2. Must contains links to official website, twitter and telegram group and channel3. Content must contains minimum of 500 words4. Content must be in ENGLISH language5. Content must include all the things about TraderZoe6. Rewards will be calculated based on quality, followers, claps, likes, comments or engagement.7. Max of 2 article per person★★★★★ARTICLE CAMPAIGN REWARDS★★★★★Poor = 0 StakeAverage = 100 StakeGood = 200 StakesHigh Quality = 300 StakesFill up the form: https://forms.gle/pFM4kEmxaYBv91pz7★★★★★VIDEO CAMPAIGN RULES★★★★★1. Content must be original2. Must contains links to official website, twitter and telegram group and channel3. Content must contains minimum of 2 minutes runtime4. Content can be in any language you speak of5. Content must include all the things about TraderZOE 6. Rewards will be calculated based on quality, followers, claps, likes, comments or engagement.7. Max of 2 video per person per week8. Creating video about bounty thread and speaking about twitter profile will receive zero stakes★★★★★VIDEO CAMPAIGN REWARDS★★★★★Poor = 0 StakeAverage = 100 StakeGood = 200 StakesHigh Quality = 300 StakesFill up the form: https://forms.gle/KRayyyYzXafotDc48★★★★★SHORTS | TIKTOK CAMPAIGN RULES★★★★★1. Content must be original2. Must contains link to official website link in the first comment3. Content must contains minimum of 30 seconds runtime4. Content can be in any language you speak of5. Content must include all the things about TraderZOE 6. Rewards will be calculated based on quality, followers, claps, likes, comments or engagement.7. Max of 3 video per person per week8. Creating video about bounty thread and speaking about twitter profile will receive zero stakes★★★★★VIDEO CAMPAIGN REWARDS★★★★★Poor = 0 StakeAverage = 100 StakeGood = 200 StakesHigh Quality = 300 StakesFill up the form: https://forms.gle/T1Hc5UZSBRAKjQwD9★★★★★FACEBOOK CAMPAIGN RULES★★★★★1. Participants must share TraderZOE in 5 different crypto related facebook groups without getting banned or post getting deleted.2. Must create an informative post about TraderZOE3. No SPAM or Junk post or Generic post will not be counted4. Must include Website Link and Telegram Channel Link on your post.5. Max of 5 post per week★★★★★Facebook CAMPAIGN REWARDS★★★★★100 Stake per valid postFill up the form: https://forms.gle/VYjhSQaL2urScHee6★★★★★CAMPAIGN REPORTING GUIDE★★★★★Bitcointalk UsernameBitcointalk Profile LinkProof of Authentication LinksWeek # Twitter CampaignRT + Quote #1: RT + Quote #2: RT + Quote #3:RT + Quote #4:RT + Quote #5: Own Tweet #1Own Tweet #2Reddit CampaignPost Link #1Post Link #2Post Link #3Telegram CampaignPost Link #1Post Link #2Post Link #3Article CampaignArticle LinkVideo CampaignVideo LinkShorts/Tiktok CampaignVideo LinkVideo LinkVideo LinkFacebook CampaignPost Link #1Post Link #2Post Link #3
